column5: New look had me goofed up had to know a password and all kinds of hard stuff. Fishing is on my mind. I like the new look.
I cant stand the new look..and I think Im in the majority as it seems not too many people are posting anymore on here
I think it will take time for everyone to adjust to the new format and to get their log in/ password squared away ! BOB
Personally I find the new board alot easier to follow, it was long over due for a change.
